about_the_game:
Ain’t like an evening in your gang hideout where you can kick back on a sofa and relax, watching an Aryan dancer rave to the beats of classical EDM. Or is the music chip busted and you hear it only in your head?

This free DLC contains a Holo-Dancer that will appear in your gang HQ. It will help you relax and regain some of the Hope you lost while scavenging the grim cold prison station.
detailed_description:
Ain’t like an evening in your gang hideout where you can kick back on a sofa and relax, watching an Aryan dancer rave to the beats of classical EDM. Or is the music chip busted and you hear it only in your head?

This free DLC contains a Holo-Dancer that will appear in your gang HQ. It will help you relax and regain some of the Hope you lost while scavenging the grim cold prison station.
